code:
json
{
  "name": "gestion-projet",
  "version": "1.0.0",
  "description": "Application de gestion de projet avec React frontend, Node.js/Express backend, MongoDB, authentification JWT, upload de fichiers, notifications en temps réel avec Socket.io, et déploiement Docker",
  "scripts": {
    "start": "node server.js",
    "dev": "concurrently \"npm run start\" \"npm run start-front\"",
    "start-front": "npm run start-react",
    "start-react": "react-scripts start",
    "build": "react-scripts build",
    "test": "jest",
    "lint": "eslint .",
    "docker-build": "docker build -t gestion-projet .",
    "docker-run": "docker run -p 3000:3000 gestion-projet",
    "test-cover": "jest --coverage"
  },
  "dependencies": {
    "bcrypt": "^5.0.1",
    "body-parser": "^1.20.0",
    "express": "^4.18.1",
    "jsonwebtoken": "^9.1.0",
    "mongodb": "^4.3.1",
    "mongoose": "^6.2.1",
    "react": "^18.2.0",
    "react-dom": "^18.2.0",
    "react-scripts": "^5.0.1",
    "socket.io": "^4.5.4",
    "uuid": "^9.0.0"
  },
  "devDependencies": {
    "concurrently": "^14.2.1",
    "ejs": "^3.1.8",
    "jest": "^29.0.1",
    "react-router-dom": "^6.3.0",
    "react-toastify": "^8.2.0"
  },
  "main": "server.js",
  "engines": {
    "node": "18.14.2",
    "npm": "8.19.2"
  },
  "keywords": [
    "gestion de projet",
    "React",
    "Node.js",
    "Express",
    "MongoDB",
    "authentification JWT",
    "upload de fichiers",
    "notifications en temps réel"
  ],
  "author": "Votre nom",
  "license": "MIT"
}
